Uses of Interface
com.stormpath.sdk.api.ApiKey

  • Packages that use ApiKey 
    Package Description
    com.stormpath.sdk.account  
    com.stormpath.sdk.api  
    com.stormpath.sdk.application  
    com.stormpath.sdk.client  

    • Uses of ApiKey in com.stormpath.sdk.account

      Methods in com.stormpath.sdk.account that return ApiKey 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ApiKey Account.createApiKey()
      Creates a new ApiKey assigned to this account in the Stormpath server and returns the created resource.
      ApiKey Account.createApiKey(ApiKeyOptions options)
      Creates a new ApiKey assigned to this account in the Stormpath server and ensures the returned ApiKey reflects the specified ApiKeyOptions.

    • Uses of ApiKey in com.stormpath.sdk.api

      Methods in com.stormpath.sdk.api that return ApiKey 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ApiKey ApiKeyBuilder.build()
      Constructs a new ApiKey instance based on the ApiKeyBuilder's current configuration state.
      ApiKey ApiAuthenticationResult.getApiKey()
      Returns the ApiKey used to authenticate the API request.

    • Uses of ApiKey in com.stormpath.sdk.application

      Methods in com.stormpath.sdk.application that return ApiKey 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ApiKey Application.getApiKey(String id)
      Gets an ApiKey, by its id, that belongs to an Account that has access to this application by a mapped account store.
      ApiKey Application.getApiKey(String id, ApiKeyOptions options)
      Gets an ApiKey, by its id, that belongs to an Account that has access to this application by a mapped account store.

    • Uses of ApiKey in com.stormpath.sdk.client

      Methods in com.stormpath.sdk.client with parameters of type ApiKey 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ClientBuilder ClientBuilder.setApiKey(ApiKey apiKey)
      Allows specifying an ApiKey instance directly instead of reading the key from a stream-based resource (e.g.
